oneOf.title: AverageFRO
oneOf.description: An ISDA-defined calculated rate done using arithmetic averaging.

oneOf.title: CompoundedFRO
oneOf.description: An ISDA-defined calculated rate done using arithmetic averaging.

oneOf.title: CompoundedIndex
oneOf.description: A published index calculated using compounding.

oneOf.title: Index
oneOf.description: A published index using a methodology defined by the publisher, e.g. S&P 500.

oneOf.title: PublishedAverage
oneOf.description: A published rate computed using an averaging methodology.

oneOf.title: SwapRate
oneOf.description: A rate representing the market rate for swaps of a given maturity.

oneOf.title: TermRate
oneOf.description: A rate specified over a given term, such as a libor-type rate.
